title: Hikari, an update and ampersand discussion
content:
I have made updates to the font family Hikari and started a discussion about the ampersand solution I came up with. Please feel free to comment and share your thoughts:

[http://typophile.com/node/102212](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723130713/http:/typophile.com/node/102212 "http://typophile.com/node/102212")
author: Core0
